actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to investigate, study, and undertake measures to provide flood protection to the area adjacent to the Darby Marsh of the Ottawa County, Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to investigate, study, and undertake measures to provide flood protection to the area adjacent to the Darby Marsh of the Ottawa Wildlife Refuge in Ottawa County, Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to investigate, study, and undertake measures to provide flood protection to the area adjacent to the Darby Marsh of the Ottawa County, Ohio.
